title: Player Being salty asf
body: So I met a player  who is a lux main always goes mid , and everyone he kills mid lane  he always say's "later bich"  like  abusive as hell in game and abusive in general. Must be a kid I guess XD

replies.body:
Is'nt it that player: "[REMOVED - No Reporting Other Players]" , he plays late at night/morning in normals and then makes huge negativity and verbal abuses on game telling us he wont get reported cause riot deems him worthy as a god and riot supports his saying latta bich? His pretty famous from what I have herd.


I did play against him once or a few times. And every time he kills a player he says there garbage  and then says get good . Probably a smurf I guess . But I would have expected more from him as a player than be salty to others
Ye lol that is the one , See him piss a lot of people off recently . Hope he gets banned for his toxicity
Pretty sure he's quoting Trick2g, probs just likes the meymeys
Dude don't be stoop, go report it to the ticketmasters. me love u long time <3
